description: Add support for enhanced health reporting in ``aws elasticbeanstalk`` commands

Add support for changing the shared credentials file from the default location of ``~/.aws/credentials`` by setting the ``AWS_SHARED_CREDENTIALS_FILE`` environment variable (`botocore issue 623 <https://github.com/boto/botocore/pull/623>`__)
Add ``aws iam wait instance-profile-exists`` and ``aws iam wait user-exists`` commands (`botocore issue <https://github.com/boto/botocore/pull/624>`__)
